trans-unit.source: Specifies the type of windows that code is allowed to use.
trans-unit.target: 指定程式碼才可使用的視窗的類型。

trans-unit.source: This enumeration is used by <xref:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermission>.
trans-unit.target: 這項列舉供<xref:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermission>.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermission>

trans-unit.source: Users can use all windows and user input events without restriction.
trans-unit.target: 使用者可以使用所有 windows 和不受限制的使用者輸入的事件。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Users cannot use any windows or user interface events.
trans-unit.target: 使用者無法使用任何 windows 或使用者介面事件。

trans-unit.source: No user interface can be used.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用使用者介面。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Users can only use SafeSubWindows for drawing, and can only use user input events for user interface within that subwindow.
trans-unit.target: 使用者只能使用 SafeSubWindows 的繪圖，並只能使用該子視窗內的使用者介面的使用者輸入的事件。

trans-unit.source: Examples of SafeSubWindows are a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox"></xref>, common dialog controls, and a control displayed within a browser.
trans-unit.target: SafeSubWindows 的範例包括<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox"> </xref>，通用對話方塊控制項和瀏覽器中顯示的控制項。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Users can only use SafeTopLevelWindows and SafeSubWindows for drawing, and can only use user input events for the user interface within those top-level windows and subwindows.
trans-unit.target: 使用者只能使用 SafeTopLevelWindows 和 SafeSubWindows 進行繪圖，並只能使用使用者輸入的事件的子視窗與最上層視窗內的使用者介面。

trans-unit.source: When it runs under SafeTopLevelWindows permission, your application: - Will show the DNS name or IP address of the Web site from which the application was loaded in its title bar.
trans-unit.target: 當執行 SafeTopLevelWindows 權限，您的應用程式:-會在其標題列中顯示的 DNS 名稱或 IP 位址載入應用程式的網站。

trans-unit.source: - Will display Balloon tool-tip when it first displays, informing the user that it is running under a restricted trust level.
trans-unit.target: -將會顯示氣球工具提示，在第一次顯示時，通知使用者有限制的信任層級執行它。

trans-unit.source: - Must display its title bar at all times.
trans-unit.target: -必須隨時都能顯示其標題列。

trans-unit.source: - Must display window controls on its forms.
trans-unit.target: -必須顯示視窗控制項在其表單上。

trans-unit.source: - Cannot minimize its main window on startup.
trans-unit.target: -無法最小化在啟動其主視窗。

trans-unit.source: - Cannot move its windows off-screen.
trans-unit.target: -無法移動其 windows 螢幕。

trans-unit.source: - Cannot use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Opacity%2A> property on <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> to make its windows less than 50% transparent.
trans-unit.target: -無法使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Opacity%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>讓其 windows 小於 50%透明。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Opacity%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Must use only rectangular windows, and must include the window frame.
trans-unit.target: -必須使用矩形視窗，而且必須包含視窗框架。

trans-unit.source: Windows Forms will not honor setting <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormBorderStyle%2A> to `None`.
trans-unit.target: Windows Form 不支援設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormBorderStyle%2A>至`None`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormBorderStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Cannot make windows invisible.
trans-unit.target: -無法讓 windows 變成不可見。

trans-unit.source: Any attempt by the application to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A> property on its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> objects to `False` will be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式設定的任何嘗試<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A>屬性其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>物件加入至`False`會被忽略。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Must have an entry in the Task Bar.
trans-unit.target: -必須有工作列中的項目。

trans-unit.source: - Will have its controls prohibited from accessing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Parent%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: -將會有禁止存取其控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Parent%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Parent%2A>

trans-unit.source: By implication, controls will also be barred from accessing siblings - i.e., other controls at the same level of nesting.
trans-unit.target: 列出利用隱含方式，控制項將也會禁止存取同層級-也就是其他控制項相同的層級的巢狀結構。

trans-unit.source: - Cannot control focus using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: -無法控制焦點使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Will have restricted keyboard input access, so that a form or control can only access keyboard events for itself and its children.
trans-unit.target: -將會有受限制的鍵盤輸入存取，以便表單或控制項只能存取鍵盤事件本身和其子系。

trans-unit.source: - Will have restricted mouse coordinate access, so that a form or control can only read mouse coordinates if the mouse is over its visible area.
trans-unit.target: -將會有限制滑鼠座標存取，以便表單或控制項只能讀取滑鼠座標滑鼠是否可見區域上方。

trans-unit.source: - Cannot set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.TopMost%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: -無法設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.TopMost%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.TopMost%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Cannot control the z-order of controls on the form using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BringToFront%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SendToBack%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: -無法控制表單使用上的控制項疊置順序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BringToFront%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SendToBack%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SendToBack%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BringToFront%2A>

trans-unit.source: These restrictions help prevent potentially harmful code from spoofing attacks, such as imitating trusted system dialogs.
trans-unit.target: 這些限制有助於防止可能有害的程式碼詐騙攻擊，例如模仿信任的系統對話方塊。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。
